title: openpgp: SerializeSignaturePrefix could take a io.Writer as argument
body:
by **ilzogoiby**: 
It's a really minor thing, but changing it would allow for the output to be written to a
file or similar, instead of being limited to a Hash. There's no need to be overspecific.

Patch:
https://code.google.com/r/ilzogoiby-cryptogo/source/detail?r=e328e071ec899c1cfca7adaf64ba8fbb3911ece5
